name: StrandWilds
description:
Explore the desert, ride on a hoverbike and uncover what is causing these strange occurrences.
Controls:

WASD - Move

Mouse - Camera

E - Get on Bike

G - Exit Bike

U - Upgrade Bike (if you have an upgrade part and are near)

Page up - spawn bike (can only use once)

Page down - Teleport to End

There are a LOT of known bugs/issues at the moment, these will get patched out.
